item.description:
CROSSLISTED WITH SOCIAL FUN.

Let's Drink in History at Bell in Hand, America's Oldest Tavern, which has been around since 1795.

We're meeting up here because Ryan has put together a great pub trivia format. The questions are projected on a screen for us to read. This means there isn't a problem hearing the questions. We have the chance to get the best first prize around...a $50 Bell in Hand gift certificate.

Trivia starts at 8 PM and lasts for about two hours.  FREE APPETIZERS WHILE THEY LAST!

Join us for good food, drinks and a fun time with the best drinking buddies, bar none.

Who else is going to join the winning teams? I'm sure you'll know at least one answer. 

Check out Bell in Hand to learn this pub's history and to see the menu.

Get there when you can. Don't be shy...Say hi.

Check out MBTA or HopStop to create your route by public transit. Haymarket (orange & green lines), Government Center (green & blue lines) and Park Street  (green & red lines) subway stations are no more than a ten (10) minute walk.

 

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.how_to_find_us: We'll have the reserved tables near the stage
item.name: Trivia Night at The Bell in Hand Tavern Wednesday March 21st
